Guide to Svaneti

Here is a map showing the route of Svaneti, running vertically down the side of the page. Todo.

Overview

The Svaneti route blah blah blah. It begins blah blah blah. Because it is currently impossible to enter Svaneti from Abkhazia, we suggest beginning just north of Khaishi. This is convenient because you can begin from the main road to Mestia. A marshutka will happily drop you off here to begin your hike.

Contact

Are you a hiker? Want to help create the TCT? Whatever your interest, we want to get to know you. Send us an email at
info@transcaucasiantrail.org.
